item.description:
Give yourself a mind makeover for the New Year! 8 weeks on Wednesday evenings - $8/class payable at door.

We will use Yoga to relax and prepare your mind and body for sitting in meditation. Each week (8 weeks total) we will lengthen the meditation time and try a new technique with the goal of building up to 30 minutes of meditation and finding a practice that works for you.

Joan Darragh is an Interfaith Minister, Certified Yoga Instructor and IET Master Instructor.

To register: contact Joan at joandarragh@comcast.net or 603-305-7114
item.how_to_find_us: Enter Bedford Place form Palomino Lane. Call Joan befre 7:00 if you have trouble finding it 603-305-7114

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Beginner Meditation w/ Gentle Yoga
